overview: Yellow Magic Orchestra: Hurrah - Live 79  Includes sections of shows in New York and at the Greek Theater in Los Angeles. Track List:  Rydeen, Behind The Mask, La Femme Chinoise, Technopolis, Firecracker, Day Tripper, Solid State Survivor, Kung Tong Shonen, BGM TV-CF, Rydeen
title: Hurrah
